info.title: Drovio Login Team Interface
info.description: Manages the team login for the drovio platform using the drovio identity.

const.name: ID_TEAM_NAME
const.description: The system team name for the identity database.

prop.name: loggedIn
prop.description: Indicates whether the team is logged in for this run.

method.name: info

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id. Leave empty for current team id. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array of the team information.

method.name: updateInfo

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id. If empty or in secure mode this will be the current team. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: validate
method.description: Validates if the current account is member of the current team.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id to validate the account. If empty, get the current team id. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: logout
method.description: Logout the account from the team.

method.name: switchTeam
method.description: Switch from one team to another. The account must be valid and member of the given team id.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id to switch to.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getDefaultTeam
method.description: Get the default team for the given account.

method.name: setDefaultTeam
method.description: Set the default team for the given account.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id to set as default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getAccountTeams
method.description: Get all teams of the current account.

parameter.name: $detailed
parameter.description: Get full team details. It is TRUE by default.

method.name: getTeamMembers
method.returndescription: An array of all public account information for each member.

method.name: getIdentityTeamName
method.description: Get the current identity team name. It will check based on the request url. The format is [identity_team_name].id.[domain_team_name].drov.io
method.returndescription: The active identity team name. NULL if there is no active team. If NULL, drovio should be the active team name.

method.name: getDomainTeamName
method.description: Get the team name from the request url. The format is [identity_team_name].id.[domain_team_name].drov.io

method.name: getEngineTeamID
method.description: Get the team id from engine variables. Check first if there is an api key and then the current cookie ('tm', for dev).
method.returndescription: The team id or NULL if no active team.

method.name: getTeamInstance
method.description: Get the identity team instance for the drovio identity.
